DOC.brief_summary: This study determine utility Effexor® ( venlafaxine ) achieve response , include time response , maintain remission , time remission measure 17-item Hamilton Rating Scale Depression ( HAM-D ) determine utility Effexor® ( venlafxine ) various cluster symptom scale 17-item HAM-D .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Effexor® ( Venlafaxine ) Achieving Response Maintaining Remission
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Patients meet criterion diagnosis major depression , single recurrent episode describe DSMIV manual ( appendix 1 ) . A HAMD 17 total score least 16 baseline ( DSMIV manual , appendix 2 ) . Patients 18 year age meet eligibility requirement . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Patients take MAOI 's within 2 week prior survey . Patients know suffer bipolar disorder schizophrenia . Patients treatmentresistant , i.e. , past 3 year fail ( ) three previous adequate trial great equal 2 class antidepressant medication , ( b ) electroconvulsive therapy . Drug alcohol dependence abuse past 6 month per DSM IV criterion .
